Sandy.Samuel and Geneva Holt Farmstead:
The Samuel and Geneva Holt Farmstead, located at 10317 South 1300 West in South Jordan, Utah, United States, was built during 1907-09 and received later additions. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2001.
The farmstead, including outbuildings built in 1907 and since, was deemed significant in 2001 as one of only a "handful" of surviving historic farmsteads in South Jordan, and notably had been worked by the farm's residents and remained in the same family.
